post:
SwitchMIA Miami Hosting offers both Managed and Unmanaged Miami Dedicated Server and VPS hosting. Managed Dedicated server plans you are given a server with a control panel.

Scalable
SwitchMIA Miami Hosting offers scalable dedicated or vps solutions so you can pay for what you need and as your needs grow, we will scale your account up on your request all the way up to a clustered server environment.

Support
SwitchMIA Miami Hosting technicians are available 24/7 to assist you with your dedicated server and VPS management needs.

Global
Our world has changed, SwitchMIA Miami Hosting has changed with the world and enables you to take advantage of a global infrastructure.

Power
Miami Dedicated servers and VPS are available! from single core to 24 cores processors and with 256GB RAM with RAID or SSD drives. Custom Packages are available.

Order or get a custom miami dedicated server or vps quote:
https://switchmia.com/?page=servers
